articles.title: Apple’s Vision Air Tipped For 2027 Launch With Thinner Design, iPhone A-Series Chip, And A Starting Price Around $1,750 - Wccftech
articles.description: Apple’s Vision Air headset is rumored for 2027 with lighter design, iPhone chip power, and lower pricing to expand spatial computing.
articles.content: Apple is preparing to expand its spatial computing lineup with the upcoming Vision Air headset, which is slated to launch in 2027. The device is designed as a lighter and more affordable alternative … [+2629 chars]
